Text:
jimbus

how come you dont seed what you upload? could you just release the patch for rage mp?

thanks.
seed please. or dont post torrents.

i can play multiplayer fine. in fact multiplayer works perfect. 

but

how can i play single player? crashes at loading game. tried from rage.exe and launcher.exe. both crash when starting the game.

thansk
Use "options.cmd" or its shortcut (at Windows menu) and choose the option to play alone or without Steam.

thank you. this is a great release. easy to use(default settings in installer confirm works), unlocked all wasteland mission.

highly recommended if you want to coop rage. just make sure you have steam friends.

i dont know how to reach you. but could you release latest mw3 teknogods coop? with collection 3 dlc. as patch if possible.

thanks.
